Sec. 2-56.22. Intent and purpose of division.
The intent and purpose of this division is:
To protect County employees from the economic hardships of service-connected disability of long duration, while preserving the incentive to return to work.
To enable County departments to fill positions with medically able employees by making proper provision for those injured in the performance of their duties.
To facilitate recruitment and retention of employees for the County service.
